main_definition: Hampton can refer to various things such as a place name, an idiomatic expression or a brand name.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A town in the United States.
An idiom used to describe something that is outdated or old-fashioned.
meanings_and_examples.example: Wearing bell-bottoms and platform shoes? You're so hampton!

meanings_and_examples.definition: A brand of vacuum cleaners produced by The Hoover Company.
meanings_and_examples.example: I just bought a new Hampton vacuum cleaner.
